input_email_body:
Subject: Reported Security Incident

Attention Customer Support, an unauthorized access attempt has been detected on our hospital's system. This may have occurred due to a potential security vulnerability My name is John Doe.. Despite conducting initial audits and updating the software, we continue to observe suspicious activities You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. We kindly request your immediate assistance in investigating and resolving this matter to ensure the security integrity of our system.
